text: Graham Neil Yallop (born 7 October 1952 in Balwyn) was an Australian cricketer who played 39 Tests and 30 One-Day Internationals for Australia. He captained Australia in Tests and One-Day Internationals. He played in both the 1979 and 1983 Cricket World Cups in England. He scored eight Test centuries with a highest score of 268 against Pakistan in 1983â€“84. ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Australian cricketers
title: Graham Yallop
